interpretation:
The dotted six-pointed star is a powerful symbol of divine guidance and intuition. This card indicates that you are connected to a higher power and should trust your inner voice. Your intuition is strong, and it is leading you in the right direction. You may find that you are receiving messages from the universe through signs and synchronicities.

This card also represents a connection to the spiritual realm and a sense of oneness with the universe. You may feel a deep sense of peace and harmony as you tune into this energy. Trust that you are being guided towards your highest good and that everything is unfolding as it should.

The dotted six-pointed star reminds you to listen to your intuition and trust the guidance that you receive. You are being guided towards your true path and purpose. Trust in the universe and know that you are exactly where you are meant to be.
